posts.post_title: T206 Huggins, Jennings (2) Polar Bear Low Grade
posts.post_content:
I have the following 3 HOF's available.  All low grade, and prices are net to me.  Please include $3.50 for shipping no matter how many cards you purchase.  If interested, please contact me at [url]tbotticell@gmail.com[/url] or send a PM.

Huggins Portrait $42
Jennings Portrait $39 *PENDING*
Jennings One-Hand Polar Bear $49
